author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO RAPIDLY WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL STORMS... ...FORECAST TO PASS NORTH OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS TUESDAY AND WEDNESDAY...
summary: ...KIKO RAPIDLY WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL STORMS... ...FORECAST TO PASS NORTH OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS TUESDAY AND WEDNESDAY... As of 11:00 PM HST Mon Sep 08 the center of Kiko was located near 21.9, -152.1 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Kiko (CP4/EP112025)
